CustomField.formula: IF (OR (AND ( Defendant_First_Name__c != '', Defendant_Last_Name__c != '', ISNULL(Defendant_Date_of_Birth__c )=false), AND (Company_Employer_Name__c != null, Address_Line_1__c != null, City__c != null, Country__c != null, Postal_Code__c != null) ),true,false)
CustomField.label: Minimum requirements
